EmailTemplate.name: qAdam Questionnaire Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: qAdam Questionnaire Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{{qADAM_Questionnaire__c.Patient_First_Name__c}}},
Thank you for completing our TRT questionnaire.
I can see you have mentioned you would like to speak to someone from the Clinical Team regarding your side effects.
You can use the link below to get booked in with our Lead TRT Pharmacist:
Book A Call < https://calendly.com/rana-mirzai/trt-clinician-call >
We look forward to hearing from you.
Many thanks,
Optimale
Optimale Ltd, 71-75 Shelton Street, London, WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom
